Package magellan.client.event

Interface SelectionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    OrderEditorList
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectionAction, AddSelectionAction, AlchemyDialog, ArmyStatsPanel, AutoCompletion, BasicRegionPanel, BookmarkDock, BookmarkManager, ECheckPanel, EMapDetailsPanel, EMapOverviewPanel, ExpandSelectionAction, ExtendedCommandsDock, FactionStatsPanel, FillInsideAction, FillSelectionAction, FindAction, FindDialog, InvertSelectionAction, MagellanDesktop.KeyHandler.GameEventListener, Mapper, MapperPanel, MessagePanel, Minimapper, MultiEditorOrderEditorList, OpenSelectionAction, OrderEditor, PathfinderMapContextMenu, SaveSelectionAction, SelectAllAction, SelectIslandsAction, SelectNothingAction, SkillChartPanel, TaskTablePanel, TradeOrganizer, TradeOrganizerOld
    public interface SelectionListener
extends EventListener
    The listener interface for receiving selection events. A class interested in selection events implements this interface and registers with an instance of the EventDispatcher class to receive such events. Selection events are issued when the user selects or activates some objects informing components to display detailed information about these objects.
    See Also:
    SelectionEvent, EventDispatcher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void selectionChanged​(SelectionEvent e)
      Invoked when different objects are activated or selected.
